title: Cloudsim in cloud does not support multiple drones on tunnel_circuit_practicel_01

content.raw:
Cloudsim in the cloud does not appear to work with multiple drones on complex worlds.  A test comparing tunnel\_circuit\_practice\_01 with simple\_tunnel\_02 was done.

try10d - tunnel\_circuit\_practice\_01 - drone fails to lift off

try10a - simple\_tunnel\_02 - identical fleet / docker images to try10d - drone lifts off

It was then repeated with a slightly different fleet:

try10e - tunnel\_circuit\_practice\_01 - drone fails to lift off

try10b - simple\_tunnel\_02 - identical fleet / docker images to try10e - drone lifts off

It was then tried with two different fleets:

try10f, try10g - tunnel\_circuit\_practice\_01 - no drones lift off

‌
